com.adobe.cq.commerce.api.promotion

Interface PromotionHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PerfectPartnerPromotionHandler

    @ConsumerType
public interface PromotionHandler
    The PromotionHandler interface is implemented by services which provide business logic for Promotions.

    Services should define a property PromotionHandler.TYPE with a unique identifier, which is then used by individual promotions to select a particular PromotionHandler.

    Since:
    5.6

    • Field Summary

      Service property name.

      Informs the promotion handler that something under the promotions root has been edited, and the handler should invalidate any caches it might be keeping.

    • Method Detail

      • applyCartEntryPromotion

        PriceInfo applyCartEntryPromotion(CommerceSession commerceSession,
                                  Promotion promotion,
                                  CommerceSession.CartEntry cartEntry)
                           throws CommerceException
        Apply a promotion to a cart line item. The method returns a discount PriceInfo instance or null if no discount was applied.
        Parameters:
        commerceSession - The commerce session containing the cart.
        promotion - The Promotion to apply.
        cartEntry - The cart line item within the session's cart.
        Returns:
        the discount amount (as a PriceInfo), or null.
        Throws:
        CommerceException

      • applyOrderPromotion

        PriceInfo applyOrderPromotion(CommerceSession commerceSession,
                              Promotion promotion)
                       throws CommerceException
        Apply a promotion to an order. The method returns a discount PriceInfo instance or null if no discount was applied.
        Parameters:
        commerceSession - The commerce session containing the order.
        promotion - The Promotion to apply.
        Returns:
        the discount amount (as a PriceInfo), or null.
        Throws:
        CommerceException

      • applyShippingPromotion

        PriceInfo applyShippingPromotion(CommerceSession commerceSession,
                                 Promotion promotion)
                          throws CommerceException
        Apply a promotion to an order's shipping amount. The method returns a discount PriceInfo instance or null if no discount was applied.
        Parameters:
        commerceSession - The commerce session containing the order.
        promotion - The Promotion to apply.
        Returns:
        the shipping discount amount (as a PriceInfo), or null.
        Throws:
        CommerceException

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription(SlingHttpServletRequest request,
                                CommerceSession commerceSession,
                                Promotion promotion)
                         throws CommerceException
        Allows a promotion handler to define a custom, author-oriented message for a promotion.

        The info.geometrixx.commons.impl.PerfectPartnerPromotionHandler, for instance, uses this to list the qualifying pairs of products in the current cart.

        Parameters:
        request - The current request (used for access-control).
        commerceSession - The current CommerceSession.
        promotion - The Promotion.
        Returns:
        a custom, author-oriented message to display.
        Throws:
        CommerceException
        Since:
        5.6.200

      • getMessages

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getMessages(SlingHttpServletRequest request,
                                                              CommerceSession commerceSession,
                                                              Promotion promotion)
                                                       throws CommerceException
        Allows a promotion handler to define shopper-oriented messages for a promotion.

        An order-specific promotion should return a single message with a -1 key.

        A cart-entry-specific promotion should return its message(s) keyed to the cart entries they apply to.

        Parameters:
        request - The current request (used for access-control).
        commerceSession - The current CommerceSession.
        promotion - The Promotion.
        Returns:
        A list of messages, either keyed to individual cart entry indexes, or keyed to the order (-1).
        Throws:
        CommerceException
        Since:
        5.6.200

      • invalidateCaches

        void invalidateCaches()
        Informs the promotion handler that something under the promotions root has been edited, and the handler should invalidate any caches it might be keeping.
